TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class ListBox Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type ListBox = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示允许单选或多选的列表框控件。

span.span: Represents a list box control that allows single or multiple item selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 控件创建允许单个或多个项选择的列表控件。Use the control to create a list control that allows single or multiple item selection. 使用 属性指定控件的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the control. 若要启用多个项选择，请将 属性设置为 `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` 。To enable multiple item selection, set the property to `ListSelectionMode.Multiple`. 若要指定要在控件中显示的项 ，请在 `ListItem` 控件的开始和结束标记之间放置每个项的元素 。To specify the items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 使用 集合检查 控件中包含的对象 。Use the collection to examine the objects contained in the control. 例如，你可以 通过枚举 集合并测试 每个元素的值，来确定控件中 (s) 的选定项 。For example, you can determine the selected item(s) in the control by enumerating the collection and testing the value for each element. 该 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将控件绑定到数据源，请首先创建一个数据源（如其中一个 对象），其中包含要在控件中显示的项。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下来，使用 方法将数据源绑定到 控件。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用 和 属性来指定数据源中要绑定到 `Text` `Value` 控件中每个列表项的和属性的字段。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties, respectively, of each list item in the control. 控件现在将显示数据源中的信息。The control will now display the information from the data source. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建 支持多个选择的控件。The following example shows how to create a control that supports multiple selections. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source3cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source3vb.aspx#3)] 下面的示例演示如何 通过数据绑定创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control through data binding. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取 控件中当前选定项的索引值的数组。

span.span: Gets the array of index values for currently selected items in the control.

returns.span: 整数数组，其中每个整数表示列表框中一个选定项的索引。

span.span: An array of integers, each representing the index of a selected item in the list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法标识或访问控件中的选定项 。Use the method to identify or access the selected items in the control. 返回的数组中的每个元素都表示选定列表项的索引。Each element in the returned array represents the index for a selected list item. 您可以使用索引值访问集合中的项 。You can use the index values to access the items in the collection.

summary.span: 如果列表控件的已发布内容不同于上次发布的内容，则加载该内容。

span.span: Loads the posted content of the list control, if it is different from the last posting.

returns.span: 如果发布的内容不同于上次发布的内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从类派生自定义控件时，此方法主要由控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法指示控件的状态是否 已更改。The method indicates if the state of the control has changed. 换句话说，它会确定控件中的每个列表项是否具有 与上一个已发布值相同的值。In other words, it determines if each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 用户在控件中选择项会更改 控件集合中相应对象的值 。A user selecting an item in the control changes the value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控件中选择了某些列表项，或者如果 已禁用，则 返回 `false` 。If some list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 当 方法 `true` 为控件返回时，ASP.NET 页框架将调用控件的 方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 在客户端上呈现 控件之前对该控件进行配置。

span.span: Configures the control prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从类派生自定义控件时，此方法主要由控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法允许派生类在 不附加委托的情况下处理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法在保存的视图状态和呈现内容之前执行任何必需的预呈现步骤 。The method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the .

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 只要 控件的已发布数据发生更改，就调用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从控件派生自定义控件时，此方法主要由控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the control. 当 方法指示控件中列表项的状态已更改时，ASP.NET 页框架将在控件上调用方法 。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法调用 方法来引发 事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写 方法，以便在用户选择控件中的列表项时执行自定义处理。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects list items in the control. 方法可以选择在为控件引发事件之前执行验证 。The method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 如果选择了中的列表项，则若要验证页上的一组控件 ，请将 和 属性设置为，然后 `true` 在属性中指定要验证的控件组 。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to validate in the property.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中显示的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the control.
The number of rows displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件中显示的行数 。Use the property to specify the number of rows to display in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 行数必须介于1到2000之间。The number of rows must be between one and 2000. 此范围之外的值会引发异常。Values outside of this range will raise an exception. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在控件中显示六行 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display six rows in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的行数小于 1 或大于 2000。

span.span: The specified number of rows is less than one or greater than 2000.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的选择模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the selection mode of the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件的模式行为 。Use the property to specify the mode behavior of the control. 如果将此属性设置为 `ListSelectionMode.Single` ，则仅可从控件中选择单个项 ，同时 `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` 指定可以选择多个项。Setting this property to `ListSelectionMode.Single` indicates only a single item can be selected from the control, while `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` specifies multiple items can be selected. 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性允许用户从控件选择多个选择 。The following example illustrates how to use the property to allow the user to select multiple selections from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/CS/listboxselectionmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/VB/listboxselectionmodevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的选择模式不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified selection mode is not one of the values.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，应使用 方法来处理对象更改的已发布数据 。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for changes to a object. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于处理对象的已发布数据的自定义实现 ，请重写该 成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for processing posted data for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用 方法来处理控件的已发布数据。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to process the posted data for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 只要 控件的已发布数据发生更改，就调用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 当对象的已发布数据发生更改时，应使用方法来引发事件 。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event when the posted data for a object changes. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要为对象定义引发事件的自定义实现 ，请重写 成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 当控件的已发布数据发生更改时，显式接口实现会调用 方法来引发事件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToolTip { get; set; }

Public Overrides Property ToolTip As String

member this.ToolTip : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当鼠标指针停留在控件上时所显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests over the control.

value.span: 当鼠标指针停留在控件上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > `ToolTip`属性是从类继承的 ，不适用于 控件。The `ToolTip` property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. 此属性的实现 `ToolTip` 不允许设置一个值， 如果使用 get 访问器，则返回。This implementation of the `ToolTip` property doesn't allow you to set a value and returns if you use the get accessor.
